name: Etherlords (Arena)
description:
Immerse yourself in Etherlords, a marvelous fantasy universe where the Vitals, Kinets, and Chaots are locked in a deadly confrontation for the world’s most vital and important resource. Crush your enemies, collect and evolve your creatures, and discover new strategies to dominate in PvP battles and daily tournaments.

Features:

- Intense dynamic battles with outstanding animations and visual effects
- More than 200 creatures and heroes to fight under your command
- A huge number of upgrades—evolve and merge your creatures in the Sky Lab
- Daily PvP tournaments. Climb the ladder and win the Grand Prize!
- Epic bosses with unique abilities and challenging counter-strategies
- Seasonal and daily events with exclusive gameplay and unique enemies

Stay up to date with the latest news and best victory strategies on the Etherlords Facebook page:
https://www.facebook.com/Etherlords

Recommended devices: iPhone 5 & higher, iPad 3 and iPad mini 2 & higher.

Please note that the game is free to play but you can purchase some items in it with real currency. However, this is not essential to get a perfect game experience.
